name: San Francisco SPCA - Spay/Neuter
description: Affordable spay/neuter services with tiered fees for eligible SF residents
fullDescription: The SF SPCA offers affordable spay and neuter services with tiered pricing to make sterilization accessible to all San Francisco residents.
whatTheyOffer:
- Tiered pricing based on ability to pay
- Spay and neuter for dogs and cats
- All surgeries include pain medication
- Post-operative care instructions
- Some free services for SF residents in need
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a San Francisco resident
2. Call or visit the website to learn about pricing tiers
3. Schedule an appointment
4. Bring proof of SF residency
5. Pay based on your tier at time of service
keywords: SF SPCA, San Francisco SPCA, spay, neuter, tiered pricing, dog, cat, sterilization, fix pet, affordable surgery
